nodes.text: The Praetor-class Star Battlecruiser was a model of battlecruiser. It shared a similar name to the Praetor II-class ship used by the Imperial Navy.
Prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, one derelict Praetor-class had its parts stolen by members of the Rebel Alliance for use in the main reactors of their Echo Base on the planet Hoth.

The Praetor-class Star Battlecruiser was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: Complete Locations, a 2016 reference book written in collaboration by Simon Beecroft, Kerrie Dougherty, Jason Fry, James Luceno, and Kristin Lund. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Praetor class was first mentioned in the 2004 reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy, written by Luceno.
